commands.tacz.config.default_table_limit: §a§l[TaCZ]§r Default gunsmith table recipe limit is disabled.
§a§l[TaCZ]§r Default gunsmith table recipe limit is enabled.
commands.tacz.config.server_shoot_cooldo:
§a§l[TaCZ]§r Server-side shoot cooldown check is disabled.
 §6WARNING: Disabling this will disable the shoot cooldown check in server-side at all, which may lead to potential for cheating. Only consider to disable this when you can't shoot at all often.
§a§l[TaCZ]§r Server-side shoot cooldown check is enabled.
commands.tacz.config.server_shoot_networ: §a§l[TaCZ]§r Server-side shoot network check is disabled.
§a§l[TaCZ]§r Server-side shoot network check is enabled.
commands.tacz.reload.backup: §a§l●§r You can find the overwritten files in the §c§nconfig/tacz/backup§r folder
commands.tacz.reload.overwrite_command.o: §a§l●§r You can use command §c§n/tacz overwrite true§r to enable overwrite feature.
§a§l●§r You can use command §c§n/tacz overwrite false§r to disable overwrite feature.
commands.tacz.reload.overwrite_off: §a§l●§r Now that the overwrite config is turned off, §6You are §lfree to modify§6 the tacz default gun pack!
commands.tacz.reload.overwrite_on: §a§l●§r Now that the overwrite config is turned on, §6any changes in the tacz default gun pack will be §lreset!
commands.tacz.reload.success: §a§l[TaCZ]§r All pack is reload, time: %.3f ms
config.tacz.client.key.auto_reload.desc: Try to reload automatically when the gun is empty
config.tacz.client.key.hold_to_aim.desc: True if you want to hold the right mouse button to aim
config.tacz.client.key.hold_to_crawl.des: True if you want to hold the crawl button to crawl
config.tacz.client.render.bullet_hole_pa: The threshold for fading out when rendering bullet hole particles
The existence time of bullet hole particles, in tick
config.tacz.client.render.crosshair_type: The crosshair when holding a gun
config.tacz.client.render.damage_counter: Damage counter reset time of target minecart, in millisecond
config.tacz.client.render.disable_intera: Disable the interact hud text in center of the screen
config.tacz.client.render.disable_moveme: Disable all fov effect from the movement speed attribute while holding a gun.
config.tacz.client.render.enable_tooltip: Display the gun/ammo/attachment ID in item tooltip when advanced tooltips are on.
config.tacz.client.render.first_person_b: Whether or not to render first person bullet trail
config.tacz.client.render.gun_hud_enable: Whether or not to display the gun's HUD
config.tacz.client.render.gun_lod_render: How far to display the lod model, 0 means always display
config.tacz.client.render.head_shot_debu: Whether or not to display the head shot's hitbox
config.tacz.client.render.hit_market_sta: The starting position of the hit marker when kill
config.tacz.client.render.kill_amount_du: The duration of the kill amount, in second
config.tacz.client.render.kill_amount_en: Whether or not to display the kill amount
Whether or not apply fadeout effect on the laser beam. Disabling this may improve laser performance with shaders.
config.tacz.client.render.target_render_: The farthest render distance of the target, including minecarts type
config.tacz.client.zoom.screen_distance_: Screen distance coefficient for zoom, using MDV standard, default is MDV133
config.tacz.client.zoom.zoom_sensitivity: Zoom sensitivity is multiplied by this factor
config.tacz.common.ammo.destroy_glass.de: Whether a ammo can break the glass
config.tacz.common.ammo.explosive_ammo_d: Warning: Ammo with explosive properties can break blocks
config.tacz.common.ammo.explosive_ammo_f: Warning: Ammo with explosive properties can set the surroundings on fire
config.tacz.common.ammo.explosive_ammo_k: Ammo with explosive properties can add knockback effect
config.tacz.common.ammo.explosive_ammo_v: The distance at which the explosion effect can be seen
config.tacz.common.ammo.ignite_block.des: Whether a ammo can ignite the block
config.tacz.common.ammo.ignite_entity.de: Whether a ammo can ignite the entity
config.tacz.common.ammo.global_speed_mod: The init speed of all bullet will be multiplied by this value
config.tacz.common.ammo.pass_through_blo: Those blocks that the ammo can pass through
config.tacz.common.gun.auto_reload_when_: Auto reload all the guns in player inventory, useful for pvp servers
config.tacz.common.gun.creative_player_c: Whether or not the player will consume ammo in creative mode
config.tacz.common.gun.default_gun_other: The range (block) of other gun sound, reloading sound etc.
config.tacz.common.gun.default_gun_silen: The silencer default fire sound range (block)
Default Gun Silencer Fire Sound Distance
config.tacz.common.other.default_pack_de: When enabled, the reload command will not overwrite the default model file under config
config.tacz.common.other.enable_table_fi: Enable the recipe limit of default gunsmith table or not
config.tacz.common.other.target_sound_di: The farthest sound distance of the target, including minecarts type
gui.tacz.client_gun_pack_downloader.fail: Please check the internet connection, or exit the game and re-enter the game
gui.tacz.cloth_config_warning.tips: You'll need to install the Cloth Config API mod to use the ingame configuration feature
gui.tacz.gun_refit.unload.no_space: There is no free space in inventory for you to unload attachment.
jei.tacz.attachment_query.title: Attachment Query
message.tacz.convert_from_legacy.hide: If you don't want to see this message anymore, please rename the old gun pack folder.
message.tacz.convert_from_legacy.hint: You can also use command §c§n/tacz convert§r, it will attempt to convert all old gun packs in the old directory at any time.
message.tacz.convert_from_legacy.hover: Click to convert old gun packs in the old directory
message.tacz.convert_from_legacy.intro: TaCZ has upgraded the gun pack format, old format is deprecated and no longer use.
message.tacz.convert_from_legacy.intro2: For old version gun packs, you need convert them for continues use.
message.tacz.convert_from_legacy: Find old version gun packs. Do you want to convert them now?
message.tacz.converter.finish: Convert finished! Total Time: %d ms. Success: %d. Skipped: %d. Failed: %d. Please §c§lRESTART THE GAME§r to take effect!
message.tacz.converter.init_failed: Failed to init gun pack directory, check the log for more details.
message.tacz.converter.pack.failed: Failed to convert %s, check the log for more details, skip...
message.tacz.converter.pack.folder: Folder format pack %s can not be converted, if you need convert it please zip it first, skipped...
message.tacz.converter.start: Start to convert old gun packs... §c§lPLEASE DO NOT INTERRUPT THE GAME!!!§r
message.tacz.fire_select.fail: Unknown fire mode, unable to shoot

tacz.attachment.ammo_mod_fmj.desc:
Steel-covered warheads.
Increases armour penetration but reduces after-effects.
tacz.attachment.ammo_mod_fmj.name: §eFull Metal Jacket Ammo
tacz.attachment.ammo_mod_he.desc:
High explosive charged warheads.
Reduced direct hit and penetration capability, but high explosive power.
tacz.attachment.ammo_mod_he.name: §eHigh Explosive Ammo
tacz.attachment.ammo_mod_hp.desc:
Hollowed-out warheads.
Enhances lethality against unarmoured targets, but reduces armour penetration.
tacz.attachment.ammo_mod_hp.name: §eHollow-Point Ammo
tacz.attachment.ammo_mod_i.desc:
Thermal incendiaries filled warheads.
Capable of igniting the target.
